_comment: Created by rreed on 05/01/2017 15:02:07 using v2.7
title: How did NHS staff sickness rates vary by trust type?
analysis_commentary:
Sickness absence rates by type of organisation demonstrate the same marked seasonal fluctuation as the rate at a national level and no organisation type shows a marked difference over the time period. Absence rates in ambulance trusts have been consistently higher than all other types of organisations and mental health & learning disability trusts and community provider trusts also are consistently higher than the national average.

Updated November 2016.
data_source: Health and Social Care Information Centre, NHS Sickness Absence Rates
